    • org.apache.catalina中Connector的使用

      返回Connector的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Connector[] Service.findConnectors()
      Find and return the set of Connectors associated with this Service.
      参数类型为Connector的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Service.addConnector(Connector connector)
      Add a new Connector to the set of defined Connectors, and associate it with this Service's Container.
      void Service.removeConnector(Connector connector)
      Remove the specified Connector from the set associated from this Service.
